ComicInfo.Title: The Well at the Edge of the World!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Well at the Edge of the World!: Thor and the Warriors Three battle Satrina and Kartag. They then befriend each other. Hildegarde and Sif battle together. Mangog lays waste to Asgard. Thor and his new ally, Kartag, fight Mangog. Odin's efforts to save Asgard by transporting it to another dimension have weakened him to the point of death. Mangog prepares to deliver the deathblow.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:40:04. [Issue ID 24959]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Sif,Laecius,Atropos],Silas Grant (introduction),Hela,Mangog,Hildegarde,Warriors Three [Fandral,Kartag,Satrina,Odin,Loki,Hogun,Volstagg],The Three Norn Fates [Klothos,Thor
